author: Koimoi.Com Team
title: Live Performance Of Alia Bhatt & Varun Dhawan On Tamma Tamma Again

organizations.name: alia bhatt & varun dhawan on tamma tamma again

text: tweet Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan are currently busy in promoting their upcoming rom-com Badrinath Ki Dulhania . The duo performed on their latest track Tamma Tamma Again at the closing ceremony of Kala Ghoda Art Festival and entertained the audiences. Check out the video right here: Live Performance Of Alia Bhatt & Varun Dhawan On Tamma Tamma Again Directed by Shashank Khaitan, Badrinath Ki Dulhania is set to hit the screens on 10th March, 2017.
